long_description: Satisfy your hunger with a tasty Rise protein bar. Each bar contains at least 17g of protein to support muscle recovery after a workout. Gluten free and does not contain preservatives, genetically modified organisms (GMOs) or soy. Almond Honey flavor is just what it sounds like-almonds combined with honey for an energy boost, plus some whey protein for muscle recovery. Crunchy Carob Chip flavor contains agave and carob powder for energy during exercise and whey protein for quick recovery after a workout; nuts provide sustained energy.
short_description: Satisfy your hunger with a tasty Rise protein bar. Each bar contains at least 17g of protein to support muscle recovery after a workout.
